summary: Lowers the volume of the Ironflesh/Stoneflesh/Oakflesh Spells
descriptionHtml:
Quieter Ironflesh/Stoneflesh/Oakflesh Spells


Mod Description
========================

Got sick of having my ears blasted out by the Ironflesh spell. It seems to be a lot louder than other spells, so I bravely lowered the volume whilst flexing my sweet pectorals.

Here are three versions of the sound file. One at around 75%, one at 50% volume, and a 25% volume for the super sensitive.

Note: The three spells all use the same \"ironflesh\" sound file, so duplicate sound folders for the other spells are not needed.

Install
===============

Choose volume of preference and then extract the \"sound\" folder into your \"Skyrim/Data\" folder.


Uninstall
===================

Delete the following folder

..\\Skyrim\\Data\\sound\\fx\\mag\\alteration\\ironflesh

Cheers,
Larpster
author: Larpster
